subject: Re: [junit] Junit Installation
msgSnippet: Can you type this command on console and execute. java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore If its installed properly you should get an output as mentioned below JUnit
messageBody:
Can you type this command on console and execute.
java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore

If its installed properly you should get an output as mentioned below
JUnit version 4.0

Time: 0

OK (0 tests)


If you refer the README, it clearly says that both INSTALL_DIR\junit-
4.0.jar
as well as INSTALL_DIR should be in classpath. Hope you are not
missing that.

Regards,
Ashutosh

On 3/23/06, p_pande123 <p_pande123@...> wrote:
>
> Hi All,
> How to install Junit? I have download zip file and extract all the
> files from it. It creates a floder. I have also set the classpath but
> still it is not working. can anybody will help ?
>
>
> Regards
> Prashant P.
